subtitle: Barcelona, 16-17 November 2024
join_free: It's FREE to join!

what.title: What is Datathon FME?
what.body: The datathon is a weekend-long competition where you are challenged to solve real-world problems using machine learning, AI and data science techniques in groups of maximum 4 people. We'll present 3 challenges, and you'll have to choose one. Typically, you'll be asked to find solutions to specific problems using some datasets. Apart from this, there will be non-mandatory workshops and activities to get relaxed and meet new people!

section1.title: Where?
section1.body: Our event will take place in UPC's School of Mathematics and Statistics, located in C/ Pau Gargallo 14, Barcelona.

section2.title: When?
section2.body: The fourth edition of Datathon FME will take place on November 16 and 17 .

section3.title: Who?
section3.body: Data enthusiasts currently enrolled at university or recent graduates are welcome!.

aed1.title: About us
aed1.body: We are the Data Students' Association! We are organizing the fourth edition of this datathon, jointly with FME. Among our goals, we aim to promote data science within UPC. If you are studying Data Science & Engineering, you should definitely join us!

aed2.title: Join the event!
aed2.body: If you are thinking of partnering/sponsoring us, don’t hesitate to reach us via email. If you have any doubts, feel free to contact us as well! We also accept suggestions or ideas for other events.

aed3.title: We're looking for mentors!
aed3.body: Would you like to assist the participants with their projects? If you have any remarkable technical skill (ML, frameworks, programming languages) apply now for being a mentor!
